scripts.build: babel lambda-function.js --out-file index.js && zip authoriser.zip index.js && zip -ur authoriser.zip node_modules && aws s3 cp authoriser.zip s3://buildingperformance.arup.digital/assets/ --region ap-southeast-2 && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name test-lambda-authoriser --s3-bucket buildingperformance.arup.digital --s3-key assets/authoriser.zip  --region ap-southeast-2 && rm -rf authoriser.zip
